title: PBE
body: i cant play normal games bc i installl PBE and now i cant play normal games . How can i do that ?

replies.body: The normal and PBE clients are actually two separate programs! You should still be able to launch the normal EUW client from where you installed it.

(Assuming you are using Windows.) You need to open the live client. If you have installed LoL in the default location, you should have a folder named

> C:\Riot Games

In that folder there will be two other folders named
> * League of Legends
* PBE

It sounds like your current shortcuts point to the PBE client. Inside the *League of Legends* folder, there is a program called **LeagueClient.exe**. If you open that, you should be able to use your live .

I recommend making shortcuts to both the PBE client and the live client, giving them different names (e.g. LoL-PBE and LoL-Live) so you can tell them apart.
